channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Waymo is testing Gemini as an in-car AI assistant in its robotaxis
item.description: Waymo is testing a Gemini-powered in-car AI assistant, per findings from a 1,200-line system prompt. The assistant can answer general knowledge questions, control certain in-cabin features, and more.

item.title: These malicious Google Chrome extensions have stolen data from over 170 sites - find out if you're affected
item.description: Two Chrome extensions were found eavesdropping on people's browsing, stealing login credentials and payment card information.

item.title: Nab this superb RTX 5060 Ti gaming PC for under $900 — complete with 32GB DDR5 RAM and an AMD Ryzen 7 8700F
item.description: This iBuyPower desktop PC with Ryzen 7 performance and RTX 5060 Ti graphics is under $900 at Walmart.

item.title: En Italie, Meta contraint d’accepter les concurrents de son outil d’IA, « Meta AI », sur WhatsApp
item.description: Sur WhatsApp, la seule fonctionnalité d'intelligence artificielle (IA) disponible est l'outil d'IA maison de Meta, « Meta IA » : les systèmes concurrents ne peuvent pas avoir accès à la plateforme. Face à cette exclusion, l'autorité de la concurrence italienne, qui a ouvert une enquête sur le sujet en juillet dernier, a décidé, ce mercredi 24 décembre et à titre provisoire, de contraindre Meta à ouvrir la porte à ses rivaux....

item.title: How to set up an iPad for a child
item.description: Creating a child-friendly iPad takes a few extra steps, but Apple’s tools make the process relatively straightforward. From creating a child’s Apple ID to adjusting Screen Time and privacy settings, you can shape how your child uses the device and protect them from inappropriate content. The process varies slightly depending on whether the iPad is new or already in use, but the principles are the same: set up a managed account, connect it to Family Sharing and fine-tune the controls that keep your child’s digital space safe. Create an Apple ID for your child Every kid using an iPad should have...

item.title: The 9 top biotech startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the biotech and pharma Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: I’m a solo vlogger and these are the 6 pieces of gear I recommend for creating content that shines
item.description: Vlogging gear essentials that make my life much easier as a solo vlogger

item.title: Xiaomi Watch S4 : voilà une belle promotion de Noël pour cette montre connectée, personnalisable et endurante
item.description: Avec un suivi efficace de l'activité sportive, un design très personnalisable, une couronne pratique et une très bonne autonomie, la Xiaomi Watch S4 est une très bonne montre connectée. Bonne nouvelle : elle coûte 119 euros au lieu de 169 euros à son lancement.

item.title: TikTok Shop adds digital gift cards for last-minute shoppers
item.description: TikTok has launched digital gift cards for TikTok Shop, expanding its e-commerce push just in time for last-minute gifting.

item.title: Markets hover near record levels as Wall Street prepares to close early for Christmas holiday
item.description: Markets are closing at 1 p.m. ET for Christmas Eve and are closed on Christmas Day. Wall Street was largely unchanged early Wednesday as markets hovered near record levels on a holiday-shortened trading day.The Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 0.1% as of 9:45 a.m. Eastern. The S&P 500 index was up less than 0.1% and the Nasdaq Composite was down 0.1%.Markets will close at 1 p.m. ET for Christmas Eve and are closed for Christmas. Markets will reopen for a full day of trading on Friday, however volumes are expected to be light this week with the holiday and most investors having closed out t...

item.title: How Mill closed the deal with Amazon and Whole Foods
item.description: Matt Rogers's food waste startup will soon deploy its commercial food waste bins in grocery stores throughout the U.S. Here's how Rogers thinks about preparing a startup for success.

item.title: JBL Bar 500MK2 Review: A Fantastic Soundbar System
item.description: This compact 2.1 soundbar system offers realistic Dolby Atmos surround sound.

item.title: Apple pauses app store changes in Texas after court blocks age assurance law
item.description: Apple said it will pause its plans for compliance with the new law in Texas but notes other age assurance tech remains available to developers.

item.title: Un iPhone pliant à imprimer en 3D pour patienter avant le modèle d’Apple
item.description: La pression monte autour de l'iPhone pliant ! Les rumeurs en sont persuadées, Apple lancerait cet appareil inédit dans la gamme aux alentours de septembre prochain. Pour ceux qui n'en peuvent plus d'attendre, il est toujours possible de se faire une idée du design (supposé) de l'appareil.

item.title: The ‘Pluribus’ Finale’s Big Twist Is the Perfect Set-Up for Its Next Chapter
item.description: Carol and Manousos finally meet in the season one finale of Apple TV’s sci-fi hit—and now, the agonizing wait for season two begins.

item.title: Forget the Love Story—This Holiday Rom-Com Is a Fantasy for Environmentalists
item.description: Don't watch "A Merry Little Ex-Mas" for the cheesy romance. Watch it for the sustainability messages, which shine as bright as LED Christmas lights.

item.title: Sony’s souped-up PlayStation 5 Pro is $100 off for the rest of today
item.description: Sony’s full suite of PlayStation 5 consoles jumped in price in August due to increased US tariffs, but now through Christmas, you can save $100 on several models. This discount is especially great if you planned to go big with Sony’s PS5 Pro, the company’s priciest, most powerful console yet. Normally $749.99, you can currently […]

item.description: A quick and easy-to-follow guide to determine how much RAM your system should have for work and gaming.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Thursday, December 25 (game #928)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Abonnés Free Mobile : cette option méconnue permet de changer de numéro sans nouvelle SIM
item.description: C'est une option qui existe depuis des années, mais que tout le monde semble avoir oubliée. Free permet de changer de numéro de téléphone en quelques clics. Pas de changement de forfait, pas de nouvelle carte SIM à attendre dans la boîte aux lettres. C'est simple, rapide, mais ça peut transformer votre vie numérique en enfer administratif si vous ne faites pas attention. ...

item.title: Ce smartphone Android avec écran Oled 120 Hz et charge 68 W est à moitié prix sur le site officiel du fabricant
item.description: Depuis l'arrivée de son successeur, le Motorola Edge 50 Neo est un bon milieu de gamme qui ne cesse de voir son prix baisser. Aujourd'hui, il est à son prix le plus bas : 229 euros au lieu de 499 euros à sa sortie.

item.title: Nike shares are up after Apple CEO Tim Cook buys $3 million in stock
item.description: Nike shares rose 2% in premarket trading. Nike shares ticked up 2% in premarket trading on Wednesday after Apple CEO Tim Cook bought nearly $3 million worth of the sportswear maker’s stock.

item.title: This Prime Video exclusive Christmas anime is a heartwrenching coming of age story featuring a distractingly buff Santa Claus
item.description: I love unhinged Christmas anime Sanda, on Amazon Prime Video, but it's not for the faint of heart

item.title: This 3D-printed iPhone Fold mockup might be as close as you can come to holding the real thing
item.description: Someone took apparently leaked iPhone Fold CAD plans and turned them into a 3D print.

item.title: Holiday treats recalled from stores nationwide: Don’t let these mislabeled products spoil your Christmas party
item.description: FDA notices posted just days before Christmas identify a number of potentially harmful products, including holiday barks sold at Aldi grocery stores. During the week of Christmas, the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has announced food recalls for several holiday treats.

item.title: Italy tells Meta to suspend its policy that bans rival AI chatbots from WhatsApp
item.description: Italy has ordered Meta to suspend its policy that bans companies from using WhatsApp's business tools to offer their own AI chatbots on the popular chat app.

item.title: StubHub’s ChatGPT app turns ticket hunting into a conversation
item.description: StubHub has launched a conversational ticket‑finding app inside ChatGPT

item.title: Jim Belushi reveals how he developed his characters for Song Sung Blue and The Chronology of Water
item.description: Legendary actor and comedian Jim Belushi breaks down his process of developing the characters n 'The Chronology of Water' and 'Song Sung Blue'.
